name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text:
Upon graduation, Black women have the most student debt at $37,600 among women.

Four years after graduation, the average Black borrower has nearly $53,000 in student loan debt.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text:
Four years after graduation, the average Black borrower has nearly 53,000 in student loan debt‚Äîtwice the amount as white borrowers.

Canceling anything less than 30% won‚Äôt come close to even touching the racial wealth gap.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text:

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush

Making Black borrowers more likely to accumulate more interest and default on their payments.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: George Floyd should still be here today ‚Äî and it is in his name that we will continue to fight until justice is won for everyone.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: It‚Äôs why we are committed to shifting away from a reliance on systems of policing and incarceration that perpetuate violence and trauma on Black and brown communities and towards systems that value our humanity and truly keep us safe.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: It‚Äôs why we lead with an agenda rooted in saving lives. It‚Äôs why we are committed to ensuring the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act puts an end to qualified immunity once and for all.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: Honoring George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, Michael Brown Jr., and too many other Black people taken from our communities by state violence is at the heart of why we legislate in defense of Black lives.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: We honor his life, legacy, and name by doing the work of achieving justice each and every day.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: Despite the adversity that George Floyd endured, he was full of life and love for his family, friends, and loved ones. It was in honor of his life that millions took to the streets in struggle for a world where George Floyd would never have been taken from us.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: He survived the vicious cycle of our racist incarceration system and opioid crisis. He suffered through COVID-19 like so many Black and brown people across our communities.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: A descendant of enslaved people, George Floyd was born with generational trauma in his DNA and denied the generational wealth that belonged to his family.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: We must acknowledge that the knee on George Floyd‚Äôs neck was just one injustice in a series of compounding systems of racism and structural inequity that he experienced in his life.

name: Congresswoman Cori Bush
tweet_text: George Floyd had a rich and loving life that was taken from him. It was taken from his daughter, Gianna. It was taken from his brother, Philonise. It was taken from each and every person who knew and loved him. That is what I‚Äôm thinking about today.
